page.title: 16 Attitudes Con't
page.content: The choice of schools is an obvious reflection of the parents view of the educational system. When asked about attitudes concerning cigarettes, drink and drug abuse, we found them to be very varied indeed.Cigarettes proved to be very anti-social with only two people actually admitting they smoke themselves. We found it quite amusing when we asked one person about her views on cigarettes, her answer was they were disgusting, yet she stood at the door busily smoking a cigarette herself ! Drink was quite acceptable within moderation. Drugs, however, proved to be viewed rather differently. We had all sorts of weird and wonderful answers but on the whole, they all said no.
